/v1/vpcs/vms/{vm_id}/reload¶

Contents

  • /v1/vpcs/vms/{vm_id}/reload
    • POST /v1/vpcs/vms/{vm_id}/reload
      • Parameters
      • Response status codes

POST /v1/vpcs/vms/{vm_id}/reload¶

Reload a VPCS instance

Parameters¶

  • vm_id: UUID for the instance

Response status codes¶

  • 400: Invalid instance UUID
  • 404: Instance doesn’t exist
  • 204: Instance reloaded
